title: Electrolyte engineering for thermally stable Li–S batteries operating from –20 °C to 100 °C
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03191A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Dong Guo, Simil Thomas, Jehad K. El-Demellawi, Zixiong Shi, Zhiming Zhao, Christian G. Canlas, Yongjiu Lei, Jian Yin, Yaping Zhang, Mohamed Nejib Hedhili, Muhammad Arsalan, Yunpei Zhu, Osman M. Bakr, Omar F. Mohammed, Husam N. Alshareef
An optimized electrolyte configuration is proposed for high performance Li–S batteries operating in extremely harsh temperature environments.
